attributes.name: Temporarily Scheduled Task Creation v2.0.1
attributes.description: Indicates the creation and deletion of a scheduled task within a short time interval. Adversaries can use these to proxy malicious execution via the schedule service and perform clean up.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Legitimate scheduled tasks may be created during installation of new software.
attributes.query:
sequence by host.id, winlog.event_data.TaskName with maxspan=5m
   [iam where event.action == "scheduled-task-created" and not user.name : "*$"]
   [iam where event.action == "scheduled-task-deleted" and not user.name : "*$"]
